subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Horses like General Quarters and Nowhere to Hide carry their owners’ and trainers’ stubborn optimism into a Kentucky Derby that the oddsmakers say has only four legitimate contenders.
snippet: Horses like General Quarters and Nowhere to Hide carry their owners’ and trainers’ stubborn optimism into a Kentucky Derby that the oddsmakers say has only four legitimate contenders.
